page.title: 03LOCAL INDUSTRY-1
page.content: An industrial site exists where 12 or so small businesses employing 2-50 staff have been concentrated.Most companies are light engineering.Since 1982 these have overcome a general recession and are beginning to refuse work through being understaffed and unable to attract the right kind of work force. Examples include-{SAND & GRAVEL QUARRY This sand and gravel is used for building and filling tips.The quarry has been working 30 years.It is expected to close in another 20 years.It is then planned to be landscaped and turned into a boating lake.The site is 25 acres.10 people work there.They work from 7am to 5:30pm.The workers are local.700 tons of sand are extracted daily.It costs Â£1000 a day to run the quarry.
